definitions.definition: A line which traverses or intersects any system of other lines transversely .

subdefinitions.definition: A line intersecting a pair of parallel lines.

definitions.definition: A set containing one member from each of a collection of disjoint sets .

main_definition: A line which traverses or intersects any system of other lines transversely .
secondary_definitions: ( mathematics ) A set containing one member from each of a collection of disjoint sets .
